greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n odd, a(n) = n^2 else a(n) = n.
comment: a(n) = ABS(alternating sum of n-th row of the triangle in A176271), n>0. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 13 2010]
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 3, 0, -3, 0, 1).
program: (PARI) { for (n = 0, 1000, if (n%2, a=n^2, a=n); write("b065599.txt", n, " ", a) ) } // _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 23 2009
results.author: _George E. Antoniou_, Dec 01 2001
